title: REPLAY SYSTEM PLS HELP
body: Hi  i just  saved on of my games as a replay  and it saves it as  a .rolf type file and i cannot open it with html 5 can someone help me ?

replies.body:
*Lew* is 100% spot on here. Those **.rofl** files are only meant to be played by the game client. You can record snippets of gameplay from within the replay you're viewing with the *record* button at the bottom of the screen. These recorded snippets will then tell you where you can find them **(C:\Users\Example_Username\My Documents\League of Legends\Highlights)** after you've finished the recording.

Let me know if you have any further questions.
You have to view the replay from the match history and record highlights from it which then will get exported as file you can view in a browser/video player.
